data.content: Removed bead-hierarchy.ts, bead-sort.ts, bead-utils.ts compatibility shims. Migrated all imports (retakes-view.tsx, orchestration-view.tsx, 4 test files) to beat-* modules with canonical function names. Renamed test files from bead-* to beat-*. All 970 tests pass, lint/typecheck/build green. Commit 648a1f9 pushed to main.
